showScoreExcerpt:
“ ‘Prayer for the French Republic’ covers a lot of territory, yet it never flags or overwhelms, thanks to its carefully crafted script, direction, and committed performances. You will not soon forget these characters or the difficult decision they face as they struggle with what is yet another piece of the endlessly complex immigrants' story.”

Read more
